articles.title: These Drone-Installed 'Magic Balls' Could Transform The Power Grid
articles.description: A Norwegian startup has developed a technology to help study and optimize the power grid, and it all starts with "magic balls" that are installed via drones.
articles.content: Data centers are being built all over the U.S. as demand from AI companies reaches unprecedented levels, but electricity providers are increasingly struggling to keep up with this new demand. Massive data centers in California are sitting empty thank... [2587 chars]

articles.title: Israeli Study Finds Cancer Tumors May Improve Heart Function
articles.description: Scientists at the Technion–Israel Institute of Technology found in a study that cancerous serum in mice reduced fibrosis in heart muscle.
articles.content:
Scientists at the Technion–Israel Institute of Technology in Haifa conducted a surprising study revealing that cancerous serum in mice reduced fibrosis in the heart muscle.
"The failing heart can beat much better in the presence of cancer cells or a ... [2729 chars]

articles.title: As technology speeds ahead, human wisdom is ever more the answer
articles.description: The age of infinite information is magical but overwhelming. It’s us who need to decide what works
articles.content: There is no doubting the sheer quantity of knowledge, scientific and technological, in today’s society. On Christmas Day I spoke to my mum, who was on a cruise in the Caribbean, with a device called an iPhone, connected to the internet via satellites... [5876 chars]
